numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that women tended to reach out to their parents more than men.
2. I noticed that texting was the most frequent form of contact.
3. Nearly 70% of young women used texting as a form of contact.
4. I wonder why gender has such a large role in this topic.
5. This graph shows a difference in how frequently people interact in person and how frequently people interact digitally.
6. This graph relates to my community.
7. In my community, texting seems to become more common.
